howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.p1: This site works based on user check-ins.
howItWorks.p2: Check-ins can be done by scanning the QR code available on the tennis court. To avoid certain inconveniences, check-ins can only be made if you are near the court.
howItWorks.p3: When someone checks in at the court, other players will know that the court is already occupied.
howItWorks.p4: Thus, the site helps manage court availability and avoids confusion among those who want to play.
howItWorks.p5: If a user does not check in, the site will show that the court is free, even if it is not. Therefore, it is important to check in before playing so that others know the court is occupied.
